item.description: Revit 2014 Products are here!!... Well almost anyways.  Want to learn about the new features? Tobias Hathorn and Ryan Duell from Autodesk will be presenting what's new in Revit 2014!  They will review "Core" features and what's new in Revit Architecture.  We are trying to line up other presenters to review Revit MEP and Revit Structure.  We hope to devote 30 minutes to each discipline so this session may go a little longer than other ones. Hope you can join us.
item.name: What's New in Revit 2014!!
